name: unity-request-interfaces
description: A Request is an async op that may succeed, fail or be cancelled. Requests may also retrieve an item of arbitrary type. Request interfaces are kept in a separate package so that other packages may interact with requests without dependencies on any implementation.
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.install:test: rm -f *.tgz && npm pack && cd test && npm run clean && npm install
